channel.title: How do you change what the top of a shop says?
channel.description: Hi i need to know how to change what the top of a shop says and the bank. At this moment it says bank of testscape how can i change it to bank of "+playername ? please help thanks

item.title: How do you change what the top of a shop says?
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

…do what jump on java said…[br][size=1]Posted at: December 02, 2006, 08:28:41 PM[/size][hr]here search for bank of testscape replace it with this sendQuest("@whi@Bank of YOUR SERVER NAME: @red@"+playerName+"", 5383);

Read full topic

item.title: How do you change what the top of a shop says?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

For the shop in your shops.java change thename so heres a example.

shop = 44	Rare_items_store.				2	2	1038	100	1040	100	1042	100	1044	100	1046	100	1048	100	1050	100	1053	100	1055	100	1057	100	4079	100	4566	100	4565	100	1419	100

So you would change rare_items_store to the name you want it to say on the top.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change what the top of a shop says?
